attributes.action: Renationalise the Water Supply, removing the current iniquitous local monopoly situation, in which users' increasing payments go to Shareholders rather than imroving and repairing the current system to the benefit of all users.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Privatisation was originally to create competition, but there can be no competition where only one company has power over the water supply in your area.  This has created a situation whereby all profits go to shareholders instead of being ploughed back into the infrastructure to benefit all users.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
